summary: This is a forwarded email from July 31, 2019, containing a link to a New York Post article about attorney Gloria Allred claiming to have new evidence against Jeffrey Epstein. The email appears to be sent from a mobile device.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: Mentioned in the linked article as claiming to have new evidence against Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the new evidence being claimed by attorney Gloria Allred.

connections.description: Allred is an attorney claiming to have new evidence against Epstein.

events.title: Allred Claims New Evidence Against Epstein
events.description: Attorney Gloria Allred claims to have obtained new evidence against Jeffrey Epstein, as reported by the New York Post.

keyFacts: Attorney Gloria Allred claimed to have new evidence against Jeffrey Epstein on July 31, 2019.
The claim was reported by the New York Post.
The information was shared via email, forwarded from a mobile device.
